recipes.name: Pesto Pasta
recipes.cooking_method: 1. Cook the spaghetti in boiling salted water until al dente. 2. In a food processor, combine the basil leaves, pine nuts, garlic, and parmesan cheese. Pulse until roughly chopped. 3. With the food processor running, drizzle in the olive oil until a smooth pesto forms. 4. Drain the spaghetti and toss with the pesto. Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
